aka: Death of a Man in Balkans

cast.name: 米莉察·米哈伊洛维奇 Milica Mihajlovic

trans_title: Death of a Man in Balkans
introduction: A lonely composer commits suicide in his apartment. By means of a webcam that the victim mounted on a tripod and pointed at the middle of the room, we are able to follow the commotion that subsequently takes place in his flat. This original, low-budget movie, packed with snappy dialogue and functioning as a window onto the “Balkan mentality,” is shot entirely in one take.
